attributes.action: Implement equal state pension for all pensioners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have worked for 35 years as a full time housewife and carer for a child with asthma. This role demanded that I work longer hours than I would have had to in standard full time employment and prevented me from seeking full time emplyment. My state pension is set at just £37.88 and I do not feel that this reflects the amount of work I have had to do throughout my working life.
